html: With all this talk of charter change, would it be so insane to actually thoroughly examine the constitution and throw out laws that no longer make sense? I mean, how can there be true separation of church and state when there’s a law that covers offense of religious feelings? 1/

html: I have a question for you, Twitterverse. Why is it sometimes so hard to call a spade, a spade? This was something that came up at cocktails tonight, so I thought to ask here. Perhaps we’re on the same page, or on totally different ones. Just curious.
text: I have a question for you, Twitterverse. Why is it sometimes so hard to call a spade, a spade? This was something that came up at cocktails tonight, so I thought to ask here. Perhaps we’re on the same page, or on totally different ones. Just curious.

html: And to our audiences, THANK YOU for joining us!!! We had the best time performing for you!!! We hope that you had fun too!!!
text: And to our audiences, THANK YOU for joining us!!! We had the best time performing for you!!! We hope that you had fun too!!!

html: To this ridiculous, crazy talented group of actors, singers and dancers, I am floored by your abundant gifts, and even bigger hearts. To get to work with you all has been such an honor and a pleasure, and I’m hoping our paths cross over and over again.
text: To this ridiculous, crazy talented group of actors, singers and dancers, I am floored by your abundant gifts, and even bigger hearts. To get to work with you all has been such an honor and a pleasure, and I’m hoping our paths cross over and over again.

html: To @michaelarden, thank you for asking me to be your Grace. You and I seem to find adventures to take (well, YOU find them, I just come along), and we navigated both the mythical island in the French Antilles as well as the island of Manhattan with fun and glee! I love you!
text: To @michaelarden, thank you for asking me to be your Grace. You and I seem to find adventures to take (well, YOU find them, I just come along), and we navigated both the mythical island in the French Antilles as well as the island of Manhattan with fun and glee! I love you!

html: Yes, it was a ridiculous amount of hard work for everyone involved, from the actors (kids included) to creatives and production, but whoa. Our audiences that came to The Bowl all weekend made it all worth it. To everyone at The Hollywood Bowl, thank you for having us crazies!
text: Yes, it was a ridiculous amount of hard work for everyone involved, from the actors (kids included) to creatives and production, but whoa. Our audiences that came to The Bowl all weekend made it all worth it. To everyone at The Hollywood Bowl, thank you for having us crazies!

html: Having some breakfast before I pick up and leave for New York, bathing in the wonderful memories from this past weekend performing Annie at @HollywoodBowl. Many of you know that this is a full circle thing for me, but what I didn’t expect was the amount of joy, hope and optimism.
text: Having some breakfast before I pick up and leave for New York, bathing in the wonderful memories from this past weekend performing Annie at @HollywoodBowl. Many of you know that this is a full circle thing for me, but what I didn’t expect was the amount of joy, hope and optimism.
